item.title: Rain add a quote by Rain K
item.description: "We are the whole of Womanhood, governed by the universal laws that do not always manifest themselves in acceptance and tolerance of our individuality. We seek refuge and asylum in our work, to give reflection of our true selves." -- Rain K

item.title: Rain add a quote by Georgia O'Keefe
item.description: "I've been absolutely terrified every moment of my life and I've never let it keep me from doing a single thing that I wanted to do." -- Georgia O'Keefe

item.title: Rain add a quote by Ansel Adams
item.description: "When words become unclear, I shall focus with photographs. When images become inadequate, I shall be content with silence." -- Ansel Adams

item.title: Rain add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Rain add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "You never know what worse luck your bad luck has saved you from." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Rain add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Rain add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rain add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Rain add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rain add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "In one aspect, yes, I believe in ghosts, but we create them. We haunt ourselves." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Rain add a quote by Theodore Roethke
item.description: "Those who are willing to be vulnerable move among mysteries." -- Theodore Roethke

item.title: Rain add a quote by Santosh Kalwar
item.description: "I was smiling yesterday,I am smiling today and I will smile tomorrow.Simply because life is too short to cry for anything." -- Santosh Kalwar

item.title: Rain add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The Very first moment I beheld him, my heart was irrevocably gone." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Rain add a quote by Carolyn MacCullough
item.description: "I was born on the night of Samhain, when the barrier between the worlds is whisper-thin and when magic, old magic, sings its heady and sweet song to anyone who cares to hear it." -- Carolyn MacCullough

item.title: Rain add a quote by Jon Krakauer
item.description: "make a radical change in your lifestyle and begin to boldly do things which you may previously never have thought of doing, or been too hesitant to attempt. So many people live within unhappy circumstances and yet will not take the initiative to change their situation because they are conditioned to a life of security, conformity, and conservation, all of which may appear to give one peace of mind, but in reality nothing is more damaging to the adventurous spirit within a man than a secure future. The very basic core of a man's living spirit is his passion for adventure. The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun. If you want to get more out of life, you must lose your inclination for monotonous security and adopt a helter-skelter style of life that will at first appear to you to be crazy. But once you become accustomed to such a life you will see its full meaning and its incredible beauty." -- Jon Krakauer

item.title: Rain add a quote by Jon Krakauer
item.description: "Some people feel like they don't deserve love. They walk away quietly into empty spaces, trying to close the gaps of the past." -- Jon Krakauer

item.title: Rain add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Don't say you don't have enough time. You have exactly the same number of hours per day that were given to Helen Keller, Pasteur, Michaelangelo, Mother Teresa, Leonardo da Vinci, Thomas Jefferson, and Albert Einstein." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Rain add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A mind needs books as a sword needs a whetstone, if it is to keep its edge." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Rain add a quote by George R. R. Martin
item.description: "There is only one god and his name is Death. And there is only one thing we say to Death: “Not today." -- George R. R. Martin
